===Etymology===
Borrowed from a {{bor|zh|xgn|notext=1}} or {{bor|zh|trk|notext=1}} language; compare {{cog|mn|ᠬᠠᠭᠠᠨ}} and {{cog|otk|𐰴𐰍𐰣|tr=qaɣan}}. First attested at around the 3<sup>rd</sup> century.
